title: 4 Key Lessons Crude Oil Traders Should Learn From This Week
text:
The oil market made history Monday, in more ways than oneIronically, what is being referred to as the largest supply disruption in history resulted in a substantial, yet less-than-historical rallyDon't get me wrong, a 15% move in oil is breathtaking (especially for those caught on the wrong side of the move) but it isn't an economic disruptorIn fa...
